# BOFORS 255mm CAPITAL MAIN BATTERY
A [color=gold]ballistic[/color] capital-class single-barrel heavy artillery cannon, designed for devastating long-range strikes. The Bofors delivers massive impact with each shot, making it a formidable threat in capital ship engagements.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson]6 RPM[/color] ([color=deepskyblue]0.1 RPS[/color]) - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]20000 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]315 m/s[/color] - Maximum Range: [color=orange]~1575m[/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]2000u/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]12000u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]8000u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Single Shot[/color] - Shell Impact: [color=red][bold]Extremely High[/bold][/color]
